name: Rush Legacy Demo
description:
Will EvilBat take over the last planet in the galaxy?

Help Rush and his sidekick stop EvilBat from destroying the last surviving planet, Rush-bit, from their R-Light galaxy. You will need to collect all 5 power buns in the five areas from EvilBat's machines powered by it to beat EvilBat's butt with Bun Power! Will Rush and his upocoming sidekick stop EvilBat's Butt, or will EvilBat destroy the planet before anyone knew it? Who knows! Anyways, Let's RUSH through this demo!
